website_summaries.verdict: This activity table is a good value with chairs and a top that lift to reveal a LEGO-compatible surface.
pros: Also works with most Duplo blocks
Table  is a good size for a lot of activities
Chairs can hold the weight of a small adult
Not too large for most rooms
Kids can use for several years
cons: The spot in the middle of this table to store LEGOs in not very large

customer_reviews.title: Small table!!
customer_reviews.text: Very small! I bought this for my 3 yo and 2 yo and it's SO short and small. The box says 4-8 years old... maybe if SnowWhite is buying it for her crew... but for normal sized children, your 5 yo is gonna be too big. This feels super cheap also. I paid $37 and I think maybe $25 would be a value for it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaGrant

customer_reviews.title: Cool table for two
customer_reviews.text: This Lego table is cool for my two active little girls. They are 18 months old and 2 years old. It is durable and washable. LEGOS sold separately. I must warn that it is very light weight. My youngest is very strong and active she can easily lift and drag this table. She had to learn to sit properly in the chairs. Chairs easily flip. A mat under the set is highly recommended. If the child is a climber, you must be very vigilant. My youngest was easily able to climb on top. It holds her weight. But table will easily give under the child. Both can eat, pretend play and color/write comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: samia

customer_reviews.title: Cute little table!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how easy this was to put together. It literally took me 5 minutes from opening the box to setup. You simply snap the legs on to each part and viola! This is so perfect for my 18 month old grandbaby and her regular & large size legos fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M. SinghTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Chairs need more weight.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our neice and she loves it, the only issue I have with it is the chairs legs could do with a little more weight in them. My neice has had the chair slide right out from under her while she goes to sit down, and has caught her chin on the table. Other than that she sits and draws/colors with out issue on the table top.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was a good idea but all but one chair has broken since ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good idea but all but one chair has broken since Christmas (as of March). Maybe this would be ok for less rambunctious kids both of these kids weigh less than 45lbs and the chairs have broken under their weight
customer_reviews.author: Karen Francis

customer_reviews.title: Genius Table Idea For Lil Legos lover!
customer_reviews.text: I got this table for my grandson and I to build Legos and we both are very satisfied with the table! The table and chairs are really stable. I’m 105 lbs and the chairs hold me just fine. Highly recommended for the lil Lego lover!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler activity table
customer_reviews.text: We received this yesterday and my daughter seems to love it. She especially likes carrying the chairs from room to room in the house. It was easy to put together. The chairs are very lightweight, hence why my 17-month-old is able to carry both of them at the same time around the house. You should probably be careful that your little one doesn't tip over if they are climbing all over the chairs, but that is a concern you should always have with any toddler size chair. I think the set is super cute, the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica VazquezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Happy Boy and parents
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this table! We been looking for the perfect table and this one was it!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Garza

customer_reviews.title: Ever step on a LEGO in your bare feet?
customer_reviews.text: LEGO-compatible, but we still haven't given the little stinkers any LEGOs yet. Ever step on one in your bare feet? The table is perfect for our 2- and 3-year-old great grandsons. It gives them THEIR space, and is perfectly-sized for them to color, write a novel, eat a sandwich, or whatever else they do, besides LEGOs.
customer_reviews.author: tomtees

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy multi function table
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy multi function table. Legos do stick tight to the table and you have to pry them off, but on the plus side they stay put on the table for kids to build houses and structures. The bottoms of the chairs are slippy and will slide around. I have our table on carpet so it is not that bad. If it was on tile or hardwoods I would suggest putting something on the bottom of the legs so the chair doesn't fly out from under your child.
customer_reviews.author: Love Hope and Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very sturdy product. Top fits snugly on table to keep Lego block in center storage console. Bought 2 of these for my grandchildren and they are constantly used for Lego building or coloring & painting when the top is on. We even use as "kid tables" when we have the whole family over for dinner and need extra seating. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Molly K

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT compatible with Duplo blocks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 and half year old to introduce her to the bigger Duplo blocks (which she now loves by the way). I thought by "2-in-1" it had both Lego sized flat plates and Duplo sized plates. I was wrong. It's ONLY made for Legos. The "2-in-1" means it can be used for Legos OR just a flat little kids table. For the ~$25 I'm not complaining too much, it's still useful, I just REALLY, REALLY wish it had Duplo plates instead for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G. Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO table!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my 20 month old! She loves it, she would get frustrated playing with legos on top of her other table because they would move around and fall off. Her 7 year old brother likes this table too. I bought it when it was discounted at 30 percent, I would not have paid full price. It is great to have, but it is a small table. Overall, I am very happy that I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with the table. I wondered if it would be very sturdy since it's made of plastic. If you have a little guys who climbs and jumps from every surface, this product probably won't withstand that. But my 4 year old likes to sit and play legos. Even his older siblings like to play too. My teens just don't use the chairs. Everyone used to run out of flat pieces for houses but this helps with that. The storage in the center is a little small, but convenient and keeps often used pieces close by. And the cover helps make this versatile even when they aren't playing legos.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Has some safety concerns, particularly on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. The table is of decent quality. Although it is made of hard plastic, it easily bears most items my kid uses 2. Perfect size for a 3 year old Cons: 1. Chairs are not stable. My kid has already fallen twice since the chair legs does not have a rubberized bottom, it slides, especially on hardwood-floors. Please be aware of this. 2. Very hard for a child to place legos on top of the activity table 3. Would have preferred more space in the middle to hold the legos
customer_reviews.author: Newhomeowner610

customer_reviews.title: It is not compatible with big blocks or duplo blocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought the table for I thought it was compatible with big blocks and duplo blocks. It is not. I am kipping it for it is a nice table and eventually we'll upgrade to regular Legos. It was not worth it to return it. Don't buy it if they don't give you a big discount or you plan to use with regular legos
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this table and chairs set. She is obsessed with getting in and out of chairs all on her own right now and this makes it very easy. The chairs don't have arms so they're easy to get in and out of but also a bit less stable and easier to fall out of, so your kid will need to be careful. Adults can sit in these too but I wouldn't recommend doing it all the time and be careful you don't lean in them. We keep the top off the table all the time because our daughter is always playing legos on the top. It's great for setting up a base of legos and then building upwards.
customer_reviews.author: Zantos

customer_reviews.title: LEGO pieces must be ordered separately...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was disappointed because the image I view prior to purchasing showed the LEGO piece as though it was a package deal. But the actual package shows it not included. Once I separately bought the LEGO pieces my 5 year old niece loved playing with this set. I especially love that’s it neatly fits under my kitchen table for storage since my spy is small. And oh yes it’s very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: So i was excited to purchase. 1. I received it. 2. I put it together very simple. 3. It’s not safe in my eyes. Maybe if it’s on carpet. There are no slips pads for the table or chairs. So the entire set moves around my kitchen floor and my son continues falls out of the chairs. There were no blocks with the set, it’s just a LEGO table with no legos for activities. Wouldn’t recommend or buy again. Not safe at all. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: HollywoodKay

customer_reviews.title: Waited to test. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Was not dissapointed with this table, I bought it back in Aug/September. It's easy to clean, easy to put together and durable. My four year old uses this daily, and my ten year old does as well though he can't use the second chair. One of the best purchases Ive ever made as Legos are not popping up nearly as frequently through out my house. It's been turned over, chairs have been tossed around and it's still holding strong. Gets dirty? I pull it all apart, throw it in the shower and spray it off and air dry. Good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Canni

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are not safe
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of the table and even my child's lego duplo blocks fit on this table. The downside is the chairs. They are very light and flimsy. My daughter has fallen trying to get on and off these chairs. I read other reviews and bought these chairs for it: Flash Furniture Green Plastic...  Very sturdy and allows me to still make use of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find a lego table with pretty pastel colors like this. We’ve had it for several months now, moved it between several rooms, and my 3 kids have spent a lot of time using this table for various projects. It’s still in brand new condition! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Super slippery and very cheap material!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap quality chairs that are not sturdy for children. These chairs did not support my 15 month d and my 4 year old. If you have wooden floors, its an extreme nightmare! They keep slipping off when my kids tried to sit on them. They were also slippery on the rugs too! Refunds are late too! The only good thing about them is the cute lego part and the table cover. The lego table only works with the tiny lego pieces and not Duplo or the bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for two of our young grandsons. They love it! Both play with it all the time! Very pleased with the purchase. Just FYI, make sure you buy a box of Lego's to go with it, if you don't already have any, because it does not come with Lego pieces. Great for ages 2-5yrs, maybe even older depending on weight of child. The chairs probably wont hold up well for older kids but does a fantastic job for the little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Debz

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: If you can get this at a good price it is so worth it! It is perfect for 3-6 year olds. My son loves this. I love that it has a flat surface and a Lego surface. We used the Lego Duplo. However, regular Legos fix as well (even better). The table is fairly sturdy as are the chairs. Nice small set. If you kids are super rough this won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Green Family

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO table!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have searched for this type of of table sooner. Set up was extremely easy! My two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelineth Castro

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product . My almost-two-year old uses it to play, color, and eat. I love the fact that it is designed for play with Legos, although, the storage area could be bigger. The common complaint that the product is unstable is somewhat true. In the first couple of days my some slid off of a chair and got uppercut by the table. It wasn't serious but I was a little concerned. My solution? I filled the legs of the table and chairs with cement. The set is now much more stable and no accidents have happened since. I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Awemazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little table and chair set
customer_reviews.text: It's a very cute table and chair set! I love that you can use it for legos and as a regular table. The only issues I have is that the storage compartment for the legos(in the middle of the table) is really shallow so it doesn't fit many legos in there and the chairs are very flimsy and slide very easily on our wood floors(my daughter would fall when trying to sit). We just got some rubber grips for the bottom of the chair legs to handle that problem though!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my daughter! Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it’d be big enough for my 3&5 yr old. But it really isn’t. My daughter is the only one who can play with it and even then she’s too big. She falls out of the chair so easily. And she sat on it and where the leg is on top pop offed and cut her. I’m very upset and would like my money back. Only had it 4 months and it’s trash now. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: justin kielbon

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up - little one loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My dd loves this table set. Its simple enough to put together that she "helped" with assembly. The first night it served for building towers, coloring, and serving play food to her stuffies. She did spill some juice all over the table in the first few days. It cleaned up easy. She does keep trying to climb on top of the table. And it wobbles but hey the table is not meant to be sat on so I wouldn't knock the product for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jules83515

customer_reviews.title: Flaws, but still good
customer_reviews.text: The table looks really nice. Like other people have said, the chairs are a bad design. You have to really watch them as they try to maneuver them. The part I wanted it for was the LEGO’s. My two year old twins don’t play with the tiny ones yet abs they’ll definitely out grow this table by that time. But, it definitely checks off my boxes. They eat at the table and then play. They’re happy so I am too
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Larger than it looks, works with multiple size legos and doubles as a regular table with the cover.
customer_reviews.text: Upon taking it out of the packaging, I thought it was going to be way too small. But after setting it up and having my daughter test it out, it’s the perfect size for her. She’s 4 years old and loves legos and blocks. We bought this one specifically because it can fit multitudes of LEGO sizes. We have big briks right now but will also be getting her classic briks. My favorite thing about it is that it comes with a cover to place over so you can use it as a regular table too. I would highly recommend this item to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: SavageRandy

customer_reviews.title: only the table minus the chairs are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are not sturdy, unsafe, I ended up swapping them out with 2  which was $10 each on April 17th of 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Shanice Raschilla

customer_reviews.title: This table is the perfect height for my 14 month old grandson...it’s TINY!
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect height for my 14 month old grandson...it’s TINY! Cute but i expected it to be a little bigger and sturdier. The LEGO top is designed for the regular little lego blocks. By the time my 14 month old grandson is old enough to be allowed to play with those little blocks, he will have to set the table in his lap to use it. Why not make the table for the jumbo blocks? The minimum recommended age for the jumbo blocks is 3. He will be too big for this table at 3.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Nice...but
customer_reviews.text: Put some sand or some weight in these chairs...PLEASE!!! My 1 year old g-baby drags these chairs around all....day....long!!! Also, the chairs are not sturdy at all on our vinyl kitchen floors. If you have vinyl/tile your child will hit the floor more than once because the chairs are so super lightweight that they move before the child can sit down. (if you're putting them on carpet you should be okay.) Nice set, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CC White

customer_reviews.title: We did receive the part (after contacting seller 3 times; 1 phone call and 2 forms.)
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the table and chairs. Grandchild LOVES to use it. The tabletop was broken during shipping. Seller replaced the part. Our grandchild is happy and her Mom is even happier!! I would recommend this company's products. Customer Service is very nice but I guess Covid held up the replacement part. We appreciate the commitment to getting the replacement part to us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Ebook Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great set for children
customer_reviews.text: This table and chair set is great. It was purchased when our grandson was a little over 1 year old. Now he's 16 months old and he still loves it. The chairs, although used cautiously, will hold even Grandma and Grandpa when he wants us to sit and play. Our guess is that it will still be useable and suitable until he is 5 to 6 years old. Dupelos and Legos work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unstable chairs and table tip over too easily for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to get this table and chair set for our grandchildren. It's a great size for toddlers. We liked the look of it, the bright colors and the Lego cover on the inside of the table. The only problem with the set, which is a really big problem in my opinion, is that it's so light that the kids fall out of the chairs all the time and the table tips over so easily. I wouldn't recommend it, especially for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: LOVED
customer_reviews.text: Was gifted for my daughter’s 3rd birthday. She absolutely loved. Chairs are perfect for her size. Loved how the table is versatile and could be used for many things ( eating, painting, playing with legos, building puzzles) VERY easy to clean! Was able to find some lego pieces from Dollar Tree that fit this particular table 48 pieces ( found in toy section and in colors: yellow, red, black, blue, and white)!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and great for its price. I like that my toddler can move it whenever she wants to sit somewhere else in the house... I refuse to give toddlers tiny legos so we never really use the LEGO part of the table however the fact that we can remove the top part to expose the LEGO table makes it so much easier to clean ... overall, I would recommend this table
customer_reviews.author: Chan Chan

customer_reviews.title: Decent but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy. My 2 year old daughter flipped it over just playing playdoh. Would not suggest letting kids eat on the table top, or you’ll have a mess. Chairs are also easily flipped. Definitely not something to buy if your kids are climbers. I do like the table though. I just wish it were a little heavier. We might have to add some weight to the legs somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline O. Naquin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old, he loves it! He can sit there and build, or we can put the top on and he can sit there to eat his snack or color! Not just a lego table, but a nice regular one as well. The center does not hold many legos, about a hand full. So we do have to have another container for all of the blocks. The chairs didn't seem strong, but 3 months in and they are still great after being with my rough little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY 3YR OLD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3yr old daughter and she loves it! I can sit in the chairs just fine and they hold my 160lbs just fine. The only thing I would criticize would be that the legs of the table and chairs are easy to take apart. My daughter likes to take them apart and move them around the house. She likes to color and got crayon and markers on the surface. It was easy to clean. It is very lightweight (enough for my daughter to move to a different room).
customer_reviews.author: ryanlw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this table for my son! We bought it two yrs ago when he was 1. It has been the best little table for him. It’s his snack table, coloring table, tablet table... it’s super easy to clean. We keep ours in the kitchen. He has smashed food on it, and colored all over it with crayons. It’s super easy to clean. This year for Christmas he’s finally getting Legos to use with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Wordmom

customer_reviews.title: The chairs for this table are not the greatest!
customer_reviews.text: I love the actual table! It’s really great how it has a cover that can hide the LEGO part and I like that it has the storage in the middle. I wish it was a little bigger but it works well! However the chairs for this table are not sturdy at all! If on hardwood or tile floor they fall over with the simplest movement. My 5 year old sits on these chairs and with the simplest movement seems to fly out from under her! I like the table, I do not like the the chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Annalia Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Happy with set
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, perfect fit for my son and sturdy enough to hold me when I sit at the table with him (125 lbs). The set slides very easily on hardwood & tile floors. Purchased adhesive furniture pads to fix that problem. Does not come with Legos
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is invincible. It’s survived in our toddlers room, on the porch, and outside in the elements. We like it a lot. The only issue I’ve had is that it’s also very lightweight so my toddler likes to drag the table around and throw the chairs every once in awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Antionette

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table. I bought this for my son 6 years ago and its still going strong. It is sturdy and durable but also vibrant and fun. The removable table lid makes it multifunctional. Its super easy to clean, the kids have used tempra paint directly on the lid and just scrape it off once its dry. My son loves the storage compartment in the center under the lid, which can also be used as a water table. The only negative thing I noticed was that Legos don't connect easily onto the table top but my son didn't let that stop him. I fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Works great if it's on carpet or padding.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little table and chair set and my 15 month old granddaughter just loves it! Note that it shouldn't be used on hardwood floors. It is a little slippery and she couldn't get in the chair because the table kept moving away from her - it was kinda cute, but we decided it was a fall looking to happen. We had some snap together foam squares that we put under it and now it is sturdy and safe with no sliding. I imagine it would work fine on carpet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Slides on floor. Need to watch smaller children to be sure chair doesn’t tip. We put our table against a wall to prevent sliding. Otherwise we love how easy it is to clean, she is happy to have her own table, note that at an average 12 month height she can’t get into the chair by herself. She is 12 month height at 21 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mamapt

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves his new table and chairs.
customer_reviews.text: My son's house has all tile floors in his house so the chairs tend to slip away when my grandson tries to sit down. My son is looking for an appropriate mat to go with the set to hopefully stop it from sliding. However, my grandson's favorite thing to do with the table and chairs is to push them all over the house! It's so funny to watch! I also love that the set is so colorful. My son is now starting to teach my grandson, Ryan, his colors.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: I love that the set has a middle compartment to store his legos after play time.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this table set. He's 5 yrs. old and he help me assemble it. It's very easy to assemble and very sturdy. Keeps him busy and challenges him.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Slides very easily. Not safe for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son who is 19 months old. It is nice, works well for legos BUT the table is actually dangerous, it slides very, very easily. No matter if you place it on carpet, wood, tile, anything. It slides very easily as soon as he tries to sit. He actually slipped and hit his chin on the table and ever since he is scared to sit on it. So he’ll just stand to color and that defeates the purpose of having chairs. I will be returning item. Definitely not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jess K

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the table
customer_reviews.text: One chair broke. It’s super hard to clean the Inside plastics building block compartment. You can’t take the panels off to clean properly water gets into the inside and mold starts to grow. Don’t recommend for toddlers who are messy. Other than that it’s actually a decent table
customer_reviews.author: Atxseven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old daughter loves it! It's her size and super sturdy. I can sit in the chairs just fine and they hold me and my 190lbs just fine. The only thing I would criticize would be that the legs of the table and chairs are super slippery. I had to get pads to put on the bottom. Other than that it's perfect! Easy to clean and carry. Also it has plenty of room for my daughter to grow in it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Shane Sterner

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale thinking it would be good for the kids. This is cheap plastic and not sturdy at all. The table is nice to play with blocks but the chairs are flimsy and my kids kept falling off them. The chairs slip on my floor, maybe with a carpet it’ll be better. Not safe for kids to sit and play. Not worth the money no matter how cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers All Purpose Dine & Play Table Set
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for what I needed for my lil granny's man man. The colors are bright, an attention getter. Chairs are sized right for age. The Lego table underneath the table top is still a secret (until Christmas), other than that he & I really like it. The chairs could be a lil heavier they fall over kind of easy but are otherwise nice. Everything is an easy clean up & disenfect after use.
customer_reviews.author: Neddy

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality( plastic) I take away the chairs because they are so light, cheap looking also my sons can’t sit down the chairs move before the kids could sit on, smaller than I expected not good For little kids under 3 and don’t recommend for kids over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this table and the chairs were the perfect size. He plays on it with his legos all the time. And uses the top whenever he plays with his slime or to color. It’s very light, so light he can cart the table himself (he’s 5) it’s a little heavy for him on his own, but he can do it.
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: This is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price. Most sets cost a bit but this is just as good. My three yr old loves it! Easy to setup just push legs into place. If you're really rough and try to break it I'm sure it would easily since it's plastic but I think most kids would do we'll with this just fine. We are very happy with the order.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Study, but kids very quick to outgrown due to size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is now 4, and she has outgrown this. It is wayyy too small to enjoy with Legos. We also got rid of the chairs and got a wobble chair to help with her balance. It is easy to clean and it has lasted a lot of abuse, but this would probably be better for a preschool than a home.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The table is cute but don't come with legos
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the item on time, fast shipping, the table was easy to put together didn't need to read the paper instructions that came with it. The size is just right for the age specified in the description. My only issue with it is that it didn't come with legos I had to purchase extra legos and ice purchased the duplo legos as I have read the F.A.Q. and seen that the duplo legos work and they don't work with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price wish it wouldn’t slid everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i hate is its really easy for the kid to fall off these chairs and for these chairs to slid everywhere especially when u have tile. Wish the chair felt sturdier when my 5 year old sits down the legs kind of want to give out but he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Geeat double-duty play table with two tops!
customer_reviews.text: Great double-duty play table for children as main table top works with Legos and has an open center to store some blocks, then the hard plastic cover converts it to a flat table for drawing or having a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Offthucuff

customer_reviews.title: The Lego top uses the very small Lego's.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to graduate our grand child from the high hair. She also uses it for activities. I wish the lego table top used larger lego's or came in other size Lego tops according to Lego size for the appropriate child. The small lego's are a choking hazard. Also, we had to superglue something to the boyyom of the table due to the table sliding on ceramic tile, carpet etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy, but does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic isnt all that sturdy, so if your kids are rammy or like to tip in their chairs, this might not be for you. My boy sits and builds intently, so it worked fine for him. The Lego top works nicely, though. The table cap is a good extra feature and offers a multi-purpose function. The storage hole in the middle is nice, but fills up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Polansky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent child table!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson when he started to walk at 1 year old - he's now 2 and a half and still loves his table and chairs. It's a very colorful and light-weight table that has a removable top to give a space for playing with legos - I'd highly recommend this table to everyone with little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia or Robert Leal

customer_reviews.title: Great table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size table, but not so large that it is hard to fit in my child’s rooms the top comes off easily, but stays on very well when attached. It doesn’t hold a lot of legos in the center, but that hasn’t been a problem. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Waltersmom

customer_reviews.title: but I liked how easy it is to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 15 month old son, he uses it but isn't quite the right age yet, but I liked how easy it is to put together. The only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is the size, seems small like he will grow out of it quickly and the "lego holder" is tiny. Inexpensive and nice addition over all to his play room.
customer_reviews.author: Quint Family

customer_reviews.title: Great little LEGO table!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with legos, small storage bin is great for keeping a small amount available as well. Smooth table top is great to make the table multi purpose. Would highly recommend for little kids who love legos.
customer_reviews.author: Carson P. Klemp

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Our pre-K son is thrilled to go from play time, to learn time. He built the chairs and table himself (that's how easy it is). I am not quite sure it will last forever, but for the price, I can't complain. It does not take a lot of space, so it is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: LMVS333

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for my granddaughter she is 20 months and will grow with her and my grandson. it is easy to put together and very sturdy. I have had this over a month and it really suits our needs. She is still to little for the small lego pieces but this table is great for coloring and meals. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, useful-Will need to see how durable it is
customer_reviews.text: These are cute & perfect size for toddlers & preschoolers. The colors are bright as pictured. This does seem a little cheaply made & durability is questionable. The 2 kiddos that are using this are quite rowdy & rough. They will certainly put durability to the test! So far, so good. I’ll update in the future with how they are standing up.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: It and ok table
customer_reviews.text: I liked the table it’s the perfect size. And works well on carpet only. If you have tile or hardwood floor I wouldn’t recommend. On hardwood floor the chairs slip and my kids end up hurt. But like I said in carpet it is fine I have it in their room and haven’t had issues there. The LEGO compartment is a bit small only a few legos can stored
customer_reviews.author: kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend for toddler
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are not sturdy. Not safe for the toddler to sit on. The table is very light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a very solid table I hate some people give it bad reviews. I have an almost 6yo the size is fine. It is made all from a thinker plastic but it does what it is suppose to do and have no problem with it highly recommended my kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine H.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table and chair set for my two and four year old granddaughters. It’s the perfect size and colors, they love eating lunch or snacks on it or just playing. However, their large LEGO blocks don’t exactly fit the play part of the table—disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year old granddaughter - she is just getting into Lego's and this is great! I see a few complaints so be aware it's lightweight plastic but sturdy and durable -it's perfect for a busy toddler. They can change the tabletop, rearrange the chairs all by themselves and it doesn't scratch my hardwood floors when she moves it around.
customer_reviews.author: jan benson

customer_reviews.title: Don't  waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. This table is cheaply made. Only good thing is how easy it is to put together. The chairs constantly flip over and slide across the hard wood floor and the table easily flips. Wish I never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great; I didn't realize until after I got it assembled that there were instructions in the box, lol. My grandson loves it and he no longer plays with his toys on my new dining table👍🏿
customer_reviews.author: Msladytay

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this table set for my twin boys. They are 17mo. and busy. This table sits them down literally....They love building their mega blocks on it. The fact that is a 2 in 1 that's where the real satisfaction come in at for me. I looked at other tables prior to purchasing glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Divah gurl uan kno?

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlera
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son likes the table. The chairs are not as sturdy but they are good for a toddler. As most toddlers are explorers and like adventure, is monitor a small child to be sure they aren’t trying to stand on the chairs. The table is easy to wipe down and sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: Twinsmom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This sucks don’t get it. Kids constantly fall, it’s light weight I can blow it over, and it slips on multi surfaces. Doesn’t have rubber on the bottom so it doesn’t stay. My daughter hit her nose which started bleeding on the table trying to simply sit on the chair. They carry the chairs over their heads and throw it. My kids are 4 and 1 and I’m talking about the 1 year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what I paid
customer_reviews.text: I paid $33 for this table, and I feel that I got a good value for the money. It's sturdy enough for my 23 lb toddler to sit on, but light enough for her to drag around the house. The legs attach quite well considering no tools are required to assemble. I don't feel that it is sturdy enough for her to use without close supervision, but that isn't what I wanted this table for. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. My great-niece loves it! Easy to clean - but be sure to put the yellow top back on before eating - the Lego block pad is a chore to clean if you get food stuck in there!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: works just fine for the 2 year old we have in the house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, wife is 118 lb and she could sit in the chair. 2 yr old loved it, moved from chair to chair Great price , great product. Thanks Couldn't find anything like it at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: autoplex99

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up easy to clean and wipe down comes with foot tabs which is nice not sure how long it will last it is cheap plastic feel but it does the job no tools needed for assembly all pieces click in
customer_reviews.author: Suzzette Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for niece
customer_reviews.text: My two year old niece loves this table. Not the best quality though, the chair broke when my niece slammed it down kind of hard. She was just moving it not trying to be destructive. The seat part of the chair cracked. The chairs are so lightweight they love around a lot when she is sitting on them.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Chair doesn’t stay in one place
customer_reviews.text: I like the chairs and table. It’s very easy to assemble no tool needed pretty strong but only thing i don’t like is it doesn’t stay in one place it’s slides backward when my daughter try to sit. Didn’t use the built thing yet bcz I haven’t buy them, they should’ve included the blocks too.
customer_reviews.author: Kazi akter

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble. Easy to clean. Perfect size for a toddler. Not as sturdy as i would of hoped. The top comes off to reveal a play table. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reinhold

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy..Toddler kept falling out of chair!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in less than 20 minutes. Easy to put together, however, the legs on the chairs are round and NOT sturdy at all. I have hardwood floors and my toddler kept falling over in the chair. After about 20 minutes of that, I packed it up and sent it back the following day. Do not purchase, unless they company addresses the chair legs.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable Table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my 4-year old son. It’s small enough to fit in the corner of my living room when not being used, yet- big enough to allow him to spend hours putting LEGO’s together with his father and I. Also, I’m not certain why people complained that the Legos wouldn’t fit the grooves on the table- I haven’t noticed that issue at all and we play daily.
customer_reviews.author: E. Orgeron

customer_reviews.title: breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Ok set until you have to take it apart. All chairs broke when we tried to take it apart. Also, the chairs are very small. Our 3 yrs barely fits on the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: The parts are very durable. My 2 year old son makes us sit on the seats, and they've been fine through that torture. I wish there was a locking mechanism on the yellow lid since most children will be able to open it up. It was a breeze to set up, but the legs need a lot of strength to lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: dzero

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: Since the table under is setup for LEGO’s I thought they would be included, go fig. Other than that the table is cool. I thought the plastic would be a bit thicker. I just think for the price I expected more. $25 would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: lasharenay

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: For $15 it was worth it and worth 4 stars but theres no net or extra lego storage beyond the small cup at the muddle of table.. have to keep a bin of legos below the table. Chairs are plastic and cant support too much weight .. one cracked from being stood on by smaller size kid 4-8yr old range
customer_reviews.author: Audrey F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My boys are super destructive and so far this table has been sturdy enough for all their shenanigans! We love it and would rec for someone looking for an affordable LEGO table!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Has survived almost 3 years to date
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my son and daughter were like 5 and 4 I think. They loved it, works great for Legos of any kind. Works great for coloring or eating. Even 2 almost 3 years later and lots of use the table and chairs still hold up. Clean up is easy just a wet rag or cleaning wipe. My kids still use it to build with and eat at
customer_reviews.author: Craig Leininger Jr

customer_reviews.title: Colorful table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors, easy to clean, the lego board. My grandson just loves sitting and having lunch or snacks on it. He loves rolling his cars around in circles on it. Probably the only thing I am not crazy about is when he (22 months) goes to get on the chairs they move a lot so you really have to watch so he doesn't fall.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pasini

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am primarily happy with my purchase. It arrived on time, was easy to assemble, and the Lego side works with all my son's current sets--not the large ones!--and the flat side is easy to clean with no leaks to the underside of the table. The storage area in the middle is rather small, but my son finds 'little treasures', as he calls them, to hide in there. That is my way of saying that you'll still need to store your sets in another place. Overall, I recommend this affordable and durable option.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Kelly

product_meta.title: Humble Crew, Red/Green/Blue Kids 2-in-1 Plastic Building Blocks-Compatible Activity Table and 2 Chairs Set, Round, Primary Colors
product_meta.description:
Color:Red/Green/Blue| Style Name:Table and 2 Chairs SetThe Tot Tutors Kids 2-in-1 Plastic LEGO-Compatible Activity Table and 2 Chairs Set features a play surface compatible with LEGO and Duplo building blocks. The smooth tabletop is removable to reveal a construction table for use with building blocks, LEGO, and Duplo blocks. The table also features a convenient BONUS storage area in the center, offering children a place to neatly stash blocks when playtime is over. With the cover on, it’s great for boys and girls to eat, read books, color, do arts and crafts, play board games, and just have fun. 

The height of this furniture is just right for toddlers and preschool-aged children. Giving your little one a table and chair set at their size gives them a sense of control and helps them learn independence. This kids table and chairs set will complement the existing furniture in your home as well as the toy storage organizer products in Tot Tutors’ line of kids furniture. Color options include bright and bold Primary Colors (red, green, blue, yellow) and Bright Colors (pink, magenta, green, aqua, white).

Product sizing -
Table: 23”W x 23”D x 17”H
Chairs: 12”W x 11”D x 18”H
Seat height: 10”H

Tot Tutors offers a full line of children’s furniture, organizational basics, and storage solutions. We have multiple room collections that fit the style of any home. Our children’s table and chairs, toy storage organizers, toy boxes, bookcases, beds, and upholstered chairs blend with all of your home’s furniture. Whether it’s the living room, playroom, or your child’s bedroom, Tot Tutors has just the right product to help your family grow
feature_bullets: Compatible with popular plastic building blocks and Duplo-blocks and includes removable cover, and 2 chairs
Building block storage area in center of construction table
Perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 years and up
Sturdy, lightweight plastic construction for easy configuration and rearranging with easy snap-together assembly
Ideal for your toddler’s bedroom, playroom, or the living room.Seat Height- 10H inches
Includes durable table and 2 chairs (Blocks not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,322 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 90 day limited warranty for damaged or missing parts due to shipping or manufacturing process.
